attributes.review: this app made my phone so so SO glitchy. every time i clicked on the app, my whole phone shut down and i had to restart. some of the times it would open, but it was super super slow. i looked to see if i needed to update the app, but there were no updates. i deleted and reinstalled it, but still no luck. as it was downloading, my phone was overheating and eventually stopped working. anyways, the rats say hello
attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: this app is so horrible i wish i never downloaded it. it kept on crashing anytime i tried to use it. the one time i got it to stay open for more than a minute it kept giving me these traumatizing pop up ads of this weird orange. i still don’t know what to make of that but i can’t sleep at night anymore. anytime i see an orange i have a mental breakdown. i have to go to therapy twice a day now so save yourselves.
attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD

attributes.review: this app is HORRIBLE. let me start by mentioning it took 3 days to download. i opened the app and a big orange face clown was right there to greet me (not appreciated) the horrendous face caused me to go into cardiac arrest, which caused a trip to the hospital (i am typing this as i lay in my hospital bed) and a near death experience. all because of this app. i demand it be taken down immediately. this is a fare warning to anyone even considering downloading. (gen z doesn't go down withought a fight)

this is literally the WORST app every. i hate it.  at first it didn’t even let me it, it kept crashing, but once i got everything done. IT CRASHES AGAIN. so then i HAD to do anything again. but i’m not done yet. once i get everything set up the second time i’m wait i’m waiting... it took 2 hours. keep in mind my wifi was COMPLETELY fine. anyways it’s a HORRIBLE app and it should be taking down. i hate it.
attributes.title: Worst app in the app store

attributes.review: When I did download this app it took 5 hours to download and when I got on it the app was just clicking random things and buttons. Then a song came on and I thought it was the national anthem but it was just saying “Vote for Trump if you want to live, if you don’t you die” I got off and deleted it but the song kept playing and I had to get a new phone. Apple I want a refund on my phone it was an 11 pro. 🤬😡
attributes.title: Impatient

attributes.title: NOOOOO IT SO BAD

attributes.review: This app is the worst app I have ever experienced in my entire 53 years on earth!!! The glitching was happening every 2 seconds and they kept displaying an image of an orange Cheeto puff! I am over the moon upset about this app and will be deleting as soon as possible. If I could give this 0 stars then I would without hesitation. This is the most ridiculous app out there and will never be downloading it again.
attributes.title: Horrifying do not download!!!!

attributes.review: I downloaded the Donald trump 2020 app to see what all the hype is about but it is constantly glitching and would crash when I opened it! The app is also very slow even though I have great internet at my house! Oh no! This app crashes so much it is completely useless. I wouldn’t download this app if I were you. If I could rate this app 0 stars I would, the developers really need to look into the app.
attributes.title: This app is so glitchy✨🧚🏻‍♀️

attributes.review: WOW let me just say this is by far THE WORST APP ON APPLE. It took forever to download one. Then it glitched the whole time using it. Not only that the app overheated my phone. The app takes up all my charge on my new iPhone and and and a picture of a Cheeto keeps appearing on my screen. I’m disgusted that this app is on App Store, and honestly want it takin down  immediately. I simply just want to support my orange president but not in these conditions.#blacklivesmatter 😉😉😉
attributes.title: I’m infuriated

attributes.review: After downloading this app, I noticed that slowly everything on my phone was turning Donald Trump themes. My screensaver, my music, my apps...everything. The fact that the app basically hacked into my phone makes me think that it probably is funneling my information to people that I never agreed to give my information to. I would highly not recommend this app...
attributes.title: Started taking over my phone screen
